english.segment1: How much is too much?. How much can one take. Till a soul finally breaks?
english.segment2: How far is too far?. When nothing looks right. No end to the night..
english.segment3: Hold on love. It's all on the line. But you'll be alright. Lift up your head. You must be strong. Must sing out your song
english.segment4: How wrong is too wrong?. Till you feel so mislead. Into a world of regret
english.segment5: How long is too long?. To trade the truth for a lie. Until there's no where to hide
english.segment6: Hold on love. It's all on the line. But you'll be alright. Lift up your head. You must be strong. Must sing out your song
english.segment7: Dropping defenses. Those rough bloody edges. That open the gate of the hate that en-cages. Hello to new life. Means hello to goodbye. Welcome the change rearranging the inside
english.segment8: Hold on love. It's all on the line. But you'll be alright. Lift up your head. You must be strong. Must sing out your song
english.segment9: Hold on love. It's all on the line. But you'll be alright. Lift up your head. You must be strong. Must sing out your song.
